text: mortgage out of the question of course. in the end, after endless paperwork and the solicitor definitely having a suspicion I was a heroin dealer, I got the fancy london lawyers we use for regulatory&tax to write them a "comfort letter". basically imagine giving your PE teacher a (real) letter from Ronaldo to let you off your lessons cos you needed to save your legs for him at the weekend. PE teacher rolls over and just signs off.

elements.text: mortgage out of the question of course. in the end, after endless paperwork and the solicitor definitely having a suspicion I was a heroin dealer, I got the fancy london lawyers we use for regulatory&tax to write them a "comfort letter". basically imagine giving your PE teacher a (real) letter from Ronaldo to let you off your lessons cos you needed to save your legs for him at the weekend. PE teacher rolls over and just signs off.

text: ultimately the liability they take on is that if you do turn out to be a heroin dealer, the sellers might have the cash confiscated as proceeds of crime and then the lawyers have to make the sellers whole. so that's what they need to be happy about.

elements.text: ultimately the liability they take on is that if you do turn out to be a heroin dealer, the sellers might have the cash confiscated as proceeds of crime and then the lawyers have to make the sellers whole. so that's what they need to be happy about.

text: The issue isn't the source of funds it's the likelihood it will be a sustainable.  Hence a cash purchase is no problem with your Betfair proof letter, but asking for credit might not be.

elements.text: The issue isn't the source of funds it's the likelihood it will be a sustainable.  Hence a cash purchase is no problem with your Betfair proof letter, but asking for credit might not be.

text:
Is anyone else watching the election market being smashed on polymarket by one user, Fredi9999 ? They currently hold about $10m on Trump winning. The Betfair market is moving with it since it is an arb.
He is buying trump for a few 100k per hour on poly which is moving moving most external markets including Betfair so Kamala is likely value.

elements.text:

text:
There was some manipulation when they had a short term contract that was settled by the long term contact. 

We've had a billion pound BF market in the past when the market was wrong or manipulated. This looks like semi informed betting otherwise we'd be stepping and correcting.

text: Do you think that moving the general prediction markets by a few percent changes the fundamentals?

elements.text: Do you think that moving the general prediction markets by a few percent changes the fundamentals?

text: I think that whilst you can arb between the larger polymarket and relatively tiny Betfair market the Betfair market will move towards the polymarket. When a single user is manipulating the polymarket price, they are the counter party to all other polymarket bets against trump including those from arbers with positions spanning bf and poly, they effectively move the Betfair market

text: I don't know if moving the markets changes the fundamentals other than it produces content compelling the manipulators cause that can then be fed back into the loop, or used as data to backup bogus election interference legal challenges.
